text: gei digaula gaa hai gi mee bolo gi helekai boloo, “Shibboleth”, gei mee ga helekai boloo, “Sibboleth”, idimaa mee e de iloo ia di gahi di ingoo donu. Digaula ga daaligi a mee gii made i di gowaa dela e hulahula ai nia daangada laa lodo di monowai Jordan. Di madagoaa deelaa, gei nia daangada e madahaa maa lua mana (42,000) ne daaligi gii mmade.
